grade_comment:
I would give this response a grade of 85.

This response does an excellent job of explaining the origins and meaning of the term "Rabbi" in Judaism, as well as its use in Christianity to refer to Jesus. It also acknowledges the importance of respecting cultural and religious differences when using terms like "Rabbi". However, it doesn't directly address the concern about understanding the role and significance of rabbinic teaching in the New Testament.

The response could be improved by exploring how the teachings of rabbis in Judaism influenced the teachings of Jesus Christ, as well as how these teachings are reflected in the New Testament. Nevertheless, this response provides a solid foundation for further exploration of this concern.
